item.title: ““I swear to God I know I look like that crazy woman who is...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

““I swear to God I know I look like that crazy woman who is screaming about this terrible dream and everybody’s like ‘What is wrong with her?’ I feel like I’m in a psych ward yelling, but nobody can hear me.”

Birhanemaskel’s head is 8,000 miles away at the refugee camp in Sudan where she was born after her parents fled bombing of their native Tigray in northern Ethiopia under a military dictatorship.”

Please help to amplify this story!!! #ApplyPressure! #WeStandWithTigray!

...

Millete, we stand with you.

See MoreMillete Birhanemaskel, a refugee, long-time Denver resident and businesswoman, grappled with 2020 as many others have: She tried to protect her family, her employees, her tenants from COVID’s reach. She worried about the presidential election. And she managed to keep her coffee shop, the Whittier ...

colabnews.co

With family missing in Ethiopia’s civil war, Denver woman says her ‘mind is the hardest place to be’

Millete Birhanemaskel, a refugee, long-time Denver resident and businesswoman, grappled with 2020 as many others have: She tried to protect her family, her employees, her tenants from COVID’s reach. item.title: “The current conversation regarding re-opening school is all...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

“The current conversation regarding re-opening school is all about how closed schools are hurting the most vulnerable students—Black students, Latinx students, English Language Learners, poor students, and students with disabilities. But, in truth the parents clamoring the most about opening schools are the parents of the most privileged children.”

☕️

It’s been a while since I’ve written a blog. The Corona Virus has forced me to address so many things virtually, that the last thing I’ve had the energy for was sitting down in front of the compute…

blackandsmart.wordpress.com

Stop Using Black Children as an Excuse to Open Your Schools

It’s been a while since I’ve written a blog. The Corona Virus has forced me to address so many things virtually, that the last thing I’ve had the energy for was sitting down in front of the compute…It’s been a while since I’ve written a blog. item.title: This news is dope! One of our missions for the past few years...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

This news is dope! One of our missions for the past few years has been the #CounselorsNotCops initiative, so we are ecstatic to see it coming to fruition in Denver. Our children deserve better, & we’ll never stop fighting until every last cop is removed from schools and replaced with adequate and effective counseling services. ✊🏽 #NothingToLoseButOurChains

The move represents a 25% reduction in the number of school resource officers and is in line with a directive to eliminate all such officers by the end of the school year.

co.chalkbeat.org

Denver begins phasing police out of schools by eliminating 3 officer positions

The move represents a 25% reduction in the number of school resource officers and is in line with a directive to eliminate all such officers by the end of the school year.The move represents a 25% reduction in the number of school resource officers and is in line with a directive to eliminate all such officers by the end of the school year.
item.author: Black Lives Matter 5280

item.title: We have Denver & Aurora family trapped in a war zone. Be...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

We have Denver & Aurora family trapped in a war zone. Be relentless in asking your elected representatives what they are doing to bring them home! #NoWarInTigray #Tigray #TigrayGenocide

Millete Birhanemaskel is with Alula Solomon and 7 others.

Foreign citizens of Tigrayan background are being blocked from boarding planes and have no options to leave an active war zone. We heard a firsthand account of ...young women who were denied food, water and were stopped from boarding a plane meant for foreign citizens.

Bazen is a child who lives in Aurora. He has type 1 diabetes and there is NO medicine in Mekelle because of looting!

Share with your representatives. Be relentless. This is urgent!

#TigrayGenocide

See More

item.title: Go get fed, fam! And share with someone in need too!
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Go get fed, fam!

And share with someone in need too!

Dan Jacobs is with Chris Hardin and 2 others at Eastern Hills Community Church. · Aurora

4 "chefs", 6 pits/ovens and 130+ lbs of smoked brisket, pork and ham getting ready for tonight. Free hot meals and groceries for all who need them. 4pm to 6pm tonight @ Eastern Hills Church on Smoky Hill. Spread the word!

item.title: Black Lives Matter 5280The Gathering PlaceSocial ServiceLearn MoreThe Gathering PlaceOur members rely on us for essential goods. Toiletries,...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280The Gathering PlaceSocial ServiceLearn MoreThe Gathering Place

Our members rely on us for essential goods. Toiletries, food, and winter weather items are some of our highest needs.

Purchasing these items from our Amazon wi...sh list allows our staff to quickly distribute your donations and gives our members the dignity of receiving unopened, unused, and unexpired goods.

Shop our Amazon wish list here: https://amzn.to/2Lg5OU6

item.title: Y'all showed OUT on #COGivesDay with an unbelievable...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Y'all showed OUT on #COGivesDay with an unbelievable $51,000 in donations! Yes- FIFTY-ONE THOUSAND DOLLARS, making it our biggest CO Gives Day ever, surpassing our goal by 255% (😳😳😳). We are so grateful and humbled, but most of all we are so excited for the work your generosity enables us to do. THIS IS WHAT COMMUNITY LOOKS LIKE! 🖤
Not Pictured: Ari, Sal, Keezy, and Diana - all of whom are in our hearts and are integral to every inch of this work.

item.title: Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will continue to share links to bail/legal support fundraising in Denver, Minneapolis and beyond. We encourage friends to donate to BLM5280’s Emergency Fund using Venmo http://venmo.com/BLM5280 . These donations will be used for bail, legal support, and provision of direct services for Black people impacted by the current and ongoing crisis. If you would like to make a tax-deductible donation that we will have access to at a later date, you can visit our Colorado Gives Day Page to donate through our fiscal sponsor, Rocky Mountain Peace and Justice Center.

Working with residents and organizations in Denver, Black Lives Matter 5280 assists in building more loving and united Black communities while eliminating anti-Black violence and racism. To expose, address and eradicate structures and systems of oppression in Denver, BLM5280 uses a holistic racial j...
